channel.title: Rdf on DistributedFog
channel.description: Recent content in Rdf on DistributedFog

item.title: Eywa
item.description: Eywa is an interoperable fog computing infrastructure for RDF Stream Processing (RSP). It implements a means of distribution and control of query workload for stream processing on flexible, interopeable, RDF graph structures. eugenesiow.com Paper Abstract Fog computing is an emerging technology for the Internet of Things (IoT) that aims to support processing on resource-constrained distributed nodes in between the sensors and actuators on the ground and compute clusters in the cloud.
